attributes.review: Words alone can not express the devastation this app has caused to my life. First, it started with the debt. I could no longer support my family, afford a house, or even pay for transportation to work. I lost my wife, my kids, and my job. I had nothing... or so I thought. Then came the sickness, coronavirus, influenza, strep, I had it all. I thought for sure it would end once I recovered. how foolish. Next came the terminal illnesses. Not one. Many. As I lay on my deathbed, with nothing to my name, I have decided to spend my last breaths warning others of the danger this app has caused to my life. I urge eve try ine to dij

Then I woke up and showed my mom, my mom now needs new eyeballs because just the sight of the oddly shaped pile scarred her and a new nose because just the though of the smell of that pole horrified her.
